text: Diana Sabine Moussier (; born August 23, 1966) is a German-Mexican actress who is best known for her villainous roles in Televisa's telenovelas. == Filmography == Television Television Television Television Year Title Role 1996 Morir dos veces Paullette Luz Clarita Unknown 1997 María Isabel Mireya Serrano 1998 El privilegio de amar Lorenza Torres 1999 Rosalinda Cristina Mujeres engañadas Diana de Lizárraga 2001 El derecho de nacer Graciela 2002 Entre el amor y el odio Frida de Villarreal 2005 La madrastra Fabiola de Mendizábal Piel de otoño Rebeca Franco 2006 Amar sin límites Eva Santoro 2007 La madrastra (new scenes) Fabiola de Mendizábal Amor sin maquillaje Beatriz 2008 Las tontas no van al cielo Marissa 2009 Mi pecado Justina Almada de Huerta 2011 Ni contigo ni sin ti Eleonor Cortazar 2012 Abismo de pasion Carmina Bouvier 2013 Amores verdaderos Bruna 2022 Corazón guerrero Victoriana Peñalver de Ruiz-Montalvo Theatre Theatre Theatre Theatre Theatre Year Title Role Notes 2005 Hombres 2008 Aventurera Elena Tejero Lead role == Awards and nominations == Premios TVyNovelas Year Category Program Role Result 1999 Best New Actress El privilegio de amar Lorenza Torres Won 2007 Best Actress in the Role of an Antagonist Amar sin límites Eva Santoro Nominated Premios ACE Year Category Program Role Result 2006 Outstanding Character Actress La madrastra Fabiola de Mendizábal Won ==Other websites== *Sabine Moussier at the Internet Movie Database Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Sabine Moussier
